dag

Class Vertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • dag.Vertex

  • public class Vertex
extends Object
    Represents a vertex of a directed, acyclic graph.

    • Method Detail

      • getPos

        public String getPos(edu.stanford.nlp.tagger.maxent.MaxentTagger tagger)
        determines the POS tag of this vertex using a maximum entropy tagger on a sentence that consists only of a cleaned up version of the label of this vertex
        Parameters:
        tagger - a maximum entropy tagger
        Returns:
        the determined POS tag

      • setSimplifiedPos

        public void setSimplifiedPos(edu.stanford.nlp.tagger.maxent.MaxentTagger tagger)
        sets the POS tag of this vertex to be the simplified version (according to PosHelper.mapPos(String, boolean) of the one returned by getPos(MaxentTagger)
        Parameters:
        tagger - a maximum entropy tagger

      • setSimplifiedPos

        public void setSimplifiedPos(String pos)
        sets the POS tag of this vertex to the simplified version (according to PosHelper.mapPos(String, boolean)) of the POS tag given as a string
        Parameters:
        pos - the POS tag in unsimplified form

      • getInstanceEdge

        public Edge getInstanceEdge()
        Returns:
        the instance edge of this vertex as described in the thesis

      • subtreeSize

        public int subtreeSize()
        Returns:
        the number of nodes in the subgraph induced by this vertex.

      • convertToTree

        public void convertToTree()
        Removes all but one incoming edge from this vertex to ensure that the corresponding AMR graph is a tree as soon as this method has been applied to all vertices. This method implements the DELETE-REENTRANCE transition described in the paper with the minor difference that it does not remove edges one by one, but all at once.

      • removeWikiTags

        public void removeWikiTags()
        Removes all outgoing edges with label :wiki.

      • getVerticesBottomUp

        public List<Vertex> getVerticesBottomUp()
        Returns:
        all vertices of the subgraph induced by this vertex in bottom-up order.

      • getEdgesBottomUp

        public List<Edge> getEdgesBottomUp()
        Returns:
        all edges of the subgraph induced by this vertex in bottom-up order.
